mainText:
Since my friend showed me my first Mac in 1991, I have been in love
with them.  I have been in awe of what you created. I have been in awe of
you. Though I never had the pleasure of meeting you in person I have always
known that ever time I turn on my Mac you were there with me. Because I know
that a little bit of your soul goes into each and every product you allow to
be produced. It's hard to envision Apple without you; I will miss you my
friend. To Steve's family my heart aches with your loss. May you find
comfort in the the coming weeks.
author: Zachary
